name: VacciniaDiseaseOrAdverseEventDisordersICD10CM
title: Vaccinia disease or adverse event (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Vaccinia disease or adverse event regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Vaccinia disease or adverse event; Superinfection of the vaccination site or regional lymph nodes, inadvertent autoinoculation, ocular vaccinia, generalized vaccinia, eczema vaccinatum, progressive vaccinia, erythema multiforme major (Stevens-Johnson Syndrome), fetal vaccinia, postvaccinial central nervous system disease),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Adverse effect of smallpox vaccines, initial encounter

contains.display: Adverse effect of smallpox vaccines, initial encounter
